links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar

wikitext.*:
'''Midway Games''' was an American video game publisher. They were the original North American publishers of [[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]].

'''Inevitable Entertainment''', developers of the [[2003]] game ''[[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|The Hobbit]]'', were acquired by Midway in [[2004]] and renamed Midway Austin. '''Surreal Software''', developers of the [[2002]] game ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', was also acquired, but that company kept its original branding.

The company was disestablished in [[9 June|June 9]] of [[2010]], because of bankruptcy. Îœost of Midway's assets were purchased by [[Warner Bros.]].
